app.title: CastCard
app.subtitle: Send text and images to your Dot device with one click

toast.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear all local data? This will remove your API Key and Device ID.

400.title: Invalid Parameters
400.suggestion: Re-upload or remove icon; ensure no data URL prefix; ensure correct size and format

link.invalid: Invalid link. Use http/https or a valid URL scheme

403.title: Forbidden
403.message: No permission to operate this device
403.suggestion: Check if API Key is correct and the device belongs to your account

404.title: Not Found
404.message: Device not found or not registered, or Text API content not added
404.suggestion: Confirm Device ID is correct and Text API content is added in Dot app

500.title: Device Response Failure
500.suggestion: Please retry later or check device network connection

network.title: Network Error
network.message: Network request failed, please check connection
network.suggestion: Ensure network is available and access to dot.mindreset.tech is allowed

unknown.title: Unknown Error
unknown.suggestion: Check detailed error message or contact support

info.refreshNowHint: When enabled, device will switch to this content immediately
info.iconHint: Icon must be a 40×40 PNG. It will be sent as Base64
info.iconDragHint: Or drag and drop an image file here
info.linkHint: Supports http/https or URL scheme, e.g., x-apple-health://

footer.disclaimer: CastCard is not affiliated with Dot official, built on public API
footer.privacy: Privacy: This app does not log or upload any API Keys, stored in browser session only
